document.title: Hot Topic: The 1996/97 MTAS Salary and Fringe Benefit Survey
document.abstract: The MT AS annual salary and fringe benefit survey for 96/97 is complete and shows salary increases for city employees rose at a rate faster than 95/96. This report contains a summary of the findings in addition to a means to request specific information.

field.name: comments
